languageModelTools.name: hopper_createFile
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Creates a file at the specified absolute path with the given content. The filePath must be an absolute path. Use this tool when you need to create new files. Example: filePath='/home/user/project/src/file.ts', content='export const x = 1;'

filePath.description: The absolute path where the file should be created

content.description: The content to write to the file

languageModelTools.name: hopper_createDirectory
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Creates a directory at the specified absolute path. The dirPath must be an absolute path. Parent directories are created automatically if they don't exist.

dirPath.description: The absolute path where the directory should be created
